details.name: help
details.description: Really? You really need help using the help command? Bruh
Displays the total value of your Rust inventory

invcost.title: Total inventory value for {{name}}
invcost.desc:
Use {{command1}} to change the server currency
Or use {{command2}}

private.title: {{name}} has a private inventory
private.desc:
Change your steam inventory privacy settings to **public**

Make sure you own some [Rust skins](https://steamcommunity.com/market/search?appid=252490)

outage.title: We had some problems fetching your inventory
outage.desc.likely: This is likely due to a temporary outage. Come back later to try again
outage.desc.definitely: This is due to a temporary outage. Come back later to try again

keybind.title: Useful Key binds
keybind.desc: Replace the `x` with whatever key you want
keybind.auto.f1: Automatically start combat log when you use the console
keybind.auto.flashlight: Turn on flashlight/laser when you ADS
keybind.perf: Graphs for PC info like FPS, ping, RAM etc
keybind.png: Get a PNG image download of server map
keybind.gibs: Removes gibs: when raiding doors disappears instantly
keybind.craft: Bind a key to craft an item. Find itemID with `;item` command

newskin.title: Checkout the latest Rust skins!
newskin.desc:
Click [here](https://store.steampowered.com/itemstore/252490/browse/?filter=All) to check them out!
Use {{command1}} or react with üëÄ to view them and their price
Use {{command2}} to get alerted when new skins are released

[Buy](https://store.steampowered.com/itemstore/252490/browse/?filter=All) all {{count}} skins now for a total of {{price}}

auto.off: New skin releases will no longer automatically send skin names, prices and images
auto.on:
New skin releases will automatically send skin names, prices and images

Use {{command1}} to turn automatic skin sending off
